Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
1) RDS is selected as Multi-AZ so even though it show quantity as 1 it is taking care of cost included for Read Replica.
2) Clounfront cost is not available in Cost Estimator. So it was added based on CloudFront pricing model.
Cost reduction is done in below areas.
1) CPU for 2 Web Server EC2 instances is lowered. This may not impact much since web server just needs to route traffic to the Application server.
2) Lower cost CPU is selected for 2 App Server EC2 instances.
3) Lower cost CPU is selected for 1 RDS
4) S3 storge requirement is minimized to reduce the cost.
5) Cloudwatch requirement is minimized to reduce the cost.
